articles.title: „Regionalität liegt im Trend“
articles.image_title: BERLIN, GERMANY - JANUARY 20: Visitor takes pictures of the flowers at the 2023 International Green Week (Internationale Gruene Woche) agricultural trade fair on January 20, 2023 in Berlin, Germany. The International Green Week is among the world's biggest agricultural trade fairs and brings together agriculture, food, nutrition and horticulture. This year's fair is the first in full, traditional format since the coronavirus pandemic. The International Green Week is open to the public from January 20-29. (Photo by Maja Hitij/Getty Images)
